root.name: Firestarter
root.description: SoundtrackThe music in Firestarter was composed by MoozE, who also composed the ambient score for S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Shadow of Chernobyl.The official soundtrack was released as a free download on November 11th, 2006. It can be found on the Russian Game-OST website.Track ListPressure - 6:30Outside The Machine - 4:11Damaged Warbot - 5:02Changing The Rules Of The Game - 5:15Connector Living Parasite - 5:39Butcher's Tunnels - 9:36B.T.B. (menu theme) - 2:27Respawn Device - 7:02Level Morphing - 5:47Infiltrator - 9:13Piranha Plant - 5:30Enemy Unit - 4:55Intro v3 - 0:31Intro v6 - 0:31
